participant_1.background:
I'd brag to my friends that I always have their backs, no matter what.
I used to be a teacher, but I wanted to spend more time with my family.
i m deathly terrified of heights.
i love dogs and cats.
i spend every waking hour i can at the archery center.

participant_2.background:
I try to take my dog on a walk everyday to stay active.
i have 10 alpacas.
I love all colors, but I like to wear dark colors when I'm knitting because it's easier on my eyes.
I've never been to a fortune teller because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have.
I'm trying to eat healthier, but my boyfriend loves fast food.

content.text: Hey! What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
Hi! I love taking my dog for walks, but I also like to knit.
That's cool! I love dogs too. I used to be a teacher, but I wanted to spend more time with my family.
Oh wow, what did you teach?
I taught kindergarten. It was a lot of fun, but it was also a lot of work.
I bet! I'm a stay at home mom to 10 alpacas.
Alpacas?! That's amazing! I've never seen an alpaca in real life.
They're so cute! I love them.
Do you knit them sweaters?
Sometimes I do! I also knit hats and scarves for them.
That's so cute! I love it.
I'm glad. I love my alpacas.
I'm sure they're very happy to have you as a mom.
I hope so! I love them very much.
I'm glad you have such a great hobby to keep you busy.
Me too! It's so relaxing and I love making things.
I'm sure your family loves your knitting too.
They do! They always ask me to make them something.
That's awesome! I'm sure they appreciate it.
They do! I'm glad I have a hobby that I love and that my family enjoys too.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that.
